data.name: The Dark Site Of The Language - One Is Not One
data.description:
A long time ago in a compiler far, far away....

We caught a radio transmission from our new spy ship "Silent Bob". This is a prototype with camouflage capability. The crew report a malfunction when activating the camouflage. The scanner and the hyper drive will also be activated. Find and fix the error or the ship is lost.

Notes:

The class Scout inherit from the abstract class Ship and implements the function Activate(). Ship provides a control function called IsActive() for tests.

Task:

Each system can be individually activated and deactivated (not part of this kata). Several systems can be activated at the same time. No system may influence another system. How the activation is checked remains hidden from us. More in the test cases.

May the force be with you!
